sentences.en: But all in all, I would say the advantages outweigh the disadvantages.
sentences.cn: 但是,总的说来, 我认为其优势大于劣势.

sentences.en: Detrimental factors will quite likely outweigh the benefits of rising automobile usage.
sentences.cn: 汽车使用量的增加带来的有害因素很有可能超过它的好处.

sentences.en: From the reasons presented above, I think the pros outweigh the cons.
sentences.cn: 从以上原因可以看出,其优势胜过劣势(优点多于缺点).

sentences.en: I let my own need for survival outweigh the fate of an entire people.
sentences.cn: 我让自己的生存的需要超过了整个种族的命运.

sentences.en: None of the problems of superconducting cables now outweigh the benefits.
sentences.cn: 现在;采用超导电缆利大于弊.

sentences.en: On balance, his accomplishments outweigh his faults.
sentences.cn: 两相比较他的成就胜过错误.

sentences.en: One's merits outweigh one's short - comings.
The advantages far outweigh the disadvantages in this case.
The advantages far outweigh the disadvantages.
The advantages of the scheme outweigh its disadvantages.
sentences.cn: 该方案的优点超过缺点.

sentences.en: The advantages of this deal largely outweigh the disadvantages.
sentences.cn: 这笔交易的利远远大于弊。
得多于失,优点胜过缺点.

sentences.en: The benefits of the scheme outweigh the disadvantages.
The medical benefits of x-rays far outweigh the risk of having them.
sentences.cn: X光在医学上的益处远甚于它带来的风险。

sentences.en: The minuses far outweigh that possible gain.
sentences.cn: 弊端远远大于那可能获得的收益。

sentences.en: The particular interests outweigh or smother the common good.
sentences.cn: 特殊利益会扼杀或凌驾于公共利益之上.

words.tran_cn: 比…重（在重量上）；比…重要；比…有价值

trans.tran_cn: 比…重（在重量上）；比…重要；比…有价值
trans.tran_en: to be more important or valuable than something else

trans.tran_cn: 在重量上超过，比…重要，胜过，强过，比…有价值
trans.tran_en: to be more important or valuable than something else
